Title: Finn the Human
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Director: Bong Hee Han, Larry Leichliter, Nate Cash
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Jesse Moynihan, Patrick McHale (story), Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Tom Herpich
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Cloris Leachman
Plot: Finn's wish to stop the evil Lich has massive cosmic consequences.
